name: Dwell Time
description:
Dwell Time

A game about old memories, ephemeral feelings, friends, and being together. 
For 4-5 people. 
---
Dwell Time is a social game intended to be played in five acts over Zoom.
For the full experience, we recommend you play this game with the full sheet of questions.
However, there is an abridged sheet of questions provided for a shorter game time, should you want a shorter experience or have less time to commit.
